title: Please un-ruin Cass. Thanks
body:
As the subject suggests, please un-ruin Cass. Her W and E are so bad now. I can't spit over walls for vision and it has a minimum range??? Pretty sure if I was a snake I could spit wherever TF I wanted to spit...

Please refund my money.

Thanks

PS. Where's the Champion forum section gone?

Yours Sincerely,
Bronze4Life

replies.body: I think where they really went wrong was her passive ... I mean like ... how in any way is that even remotely good?? sure passive move speed .. you have to get up to level 12 before you are even faster than tier 2 boots (provided you don't want the swifties of mobility boots) and you can't get the magic pen or any other buff.. I don't think it that bad really .. after all it does open up another item slot for more AP, and some would argue that cass don't even need boots because she can just sit at the back line and poison people .. but still I would like to see that passive move speed increased a little maybe even to like 5 per level would be nice. As passives go its just not that great.

Passive looks like "you get movespeed.. eventually"
What it really is, is " You get to 6 item builds instead of 5+boots"

6.10 notes from ff@20

    Cassiopeia 

    "Cassiopeia's update shaved a little too much power off of Twin Fang. Rather than raw damage buffs, we're giving back a bit of its uptime. "

    E - Twin Fang

        COOLDOWN  - 0.9 seconds ⇒ 0.75 seconds
        COST  - 60/65/70/75/80 mana ⇒ 40/50/60/70/80 mana
        CAST RANGE  - 550 (from Cassiopeia's hitbox edge to her opponent's) ⇒ 700 (from Cassiopeia's hitbox center to her opponent's.) Overall, slight increase against small targets and slight decrease against large targets.

better than nothing

its ok, but i dont like the idea of the ability being so ping reliant, short CDs like this really need a primer, having perhaps 2 charges would easily fix this and would be great as a buffer, so that ping doesnt fuck with your DPS...
At this point shes basically an AP marksman who deals AP damage instead of AD, but AD champs get to use attack move (which they should bind to left click) which makes target selection alot easier, having an ability that is intended to be spammed like this, it would help if it had some sort of target assist function where it targets the nearest champion to where you target it within a small radius, then the nearest minion, a little like the attack move function.

Other than that, having a little more control on her W would be nice
not having boots, should trade off to longer ranges on abilties.

only if they intended for her to remain slow, which they dont, so that wouldnt really work IMO

A better option i think would be for her to have regular movespeed + t1 boots at level 1. That way she always has an answer to the skillshot reliant champs that you buy boots to contend with, so she isnt at a disadvantage early by not being able to buy them.

she isnt intended to be a poke mage, so more range and low mobility arent really the best, she is intended to be something of a battle mage? i guess? shorter range and higher sustained damage patterns
Just undo 6.9 and that would solve 50% of league's problems.
